author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created a custom sound design for this video of 1924 London, it takes us through the bustling streets of the British capital, highlighting its vintage double-decker buses, its ever-present horses in traffic, and its iconic architecture in the midst of transformation rare footage a unique immersion in the daily life of Londoners over 100 years ago

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video Source: BFI (Free)-Graham-Wilcox Productions

Graham-Wilcox Productions was a British production company active in the 1920s, specializing in educational and histo
title: 100-Year-Old London Brought to Life in Color [60fps, Remastered] w/sound design Added
